html:
4.20.17  4:51 pm   so I reaalllyy love history and really don't see myself getting very sick of it, regardless of how much time i spend fixated on it, so i gotta ask: how/why did you become really, really tired of history?

     i accidentally tried to explain all of it in one sitting. it seemed like a good idea at the time

4.20.17  4:48 pm   do you enjoy video games

     yes

4.20.17  4:40 pm   why do you reply to non-questions on this page, aren't you making a mockery of people that abide by the rules?

     asking questions is not a rule. it is just a suggestion

4.20.17  4:10 pm   you said the video would be out nowhere near summer and its almost may

     i also said i am doing it as fast as possible and i hope it gets done as soon as possible. but i won't find out when it gets done until it gets done. it's kind of like a runner, running a race. i hope that makes sense

4.20.17  3:50 pm   What's the title of your new video?

     i can't tell you

4.20.17  3:42 pm   while working on this video, have there been any serendipitous mistakes or happy accidents that you didn't intend at first, but discovered you liked so you decided to keep it that way?

     i think so

4.20.17  3:29 pm   do you ever waste your time?

     not anymore

4.20.17  2:39 pm   Have you ever thought of writing a musical? You obviously have the musical talent to do so, and it could be pretty cool, even if you're the only performer. I just think you could write a really interesting story through multiple songs.

     i'm not sure exactly how that differs from what i'm already doing

4.20.17  2:19 pm   can I grill a microwave that's microwaving a toaster that roasting an iPad mini that's watching 1000 degree knife videos, and the knife is cutting a phone that's watching a stove being grilled, and that stove is baking a cake?

     yes. but will it blend

4.20.17  2:12 pm   after the release of hotewig, will you continue to try your best

     oh hell yeah

4.20.17  2:06 pm   hey what do you think of my tattoo

     in order to evaluate a tattoo, i would need to see it, with my eyes

4.20.17  1:39 pm   What's upfam?

     not much whats up with you

4.20.17  12:46 pm   why do you so bad at web design

     i do it the way i think is good. but i respect your opinion

4.20.17  12:41 pm   Do you like visual art?

     oh hell yeah
4.20.17  12:34 pm   do you ever feel like that all these questions are asked by one person

4.20.17  12:30 pm   have you written any songs in minor?

     yes

4.20.17  11:45 am   60 fps is overrated

     i agree

4.20.17  11:37 am   Do you like Tuesdays better than other days?

     not always

4.20.17  11:10 am   How do you find happiness?

     by surprise

4.20.17  10:45 am   why are there 3 jazz covers also listed on the instrumentals page

     no matter how you make the categories, there are always certain items that just don't properly seem to obey the categories. that's just the way the wonderful world works

4.20.17  10:31 am   why women want a house?

     to live in, i suppose

4.20.17  10:27 am   how do I start finding answers to stuff

     try to understand and simplify the question. once you have done that, hopefully electricity will take care of the rest

4.20.17  10:27 am   How does everything work?

     i will check

4.20.17  10:04 am   Will you make reality videos based on the new video like you did with HoJ?

     yes. although the reality videos during history of japan hardly scratched the surface of the audio that was available

4.20.17  10:00 am   my fantasy is that in the future you will give tours of your estate everyday at noon in one of those tiny trains for children. have you considered this?

     no

4.20.17  9:10 am   Couldn't you just halve the speed of the video, making it 15 fps?

     no, that would hinder the motions, and movements

4.20.17  9:01 am   Do you sometimes instead of questions get statements that are just meant to inform you of something and don't require an answer and how do you feel about them?

     informed

4.20.17  8:45 am   It is interesting that you linked that question at 6:40am but then you still gave it an individual answer on that page. I don't think I've ever seen you do that. I like it.

     then you might like the memes page

4.20.17  7:43 am   are you still in new canaan

     no

4.20.17  7:36 am   What's the best way to deal with bullies?

     vapourize them

4.20.17  7:23 am   What's your opinion on the 5-day schedule you were using?

     it saved my life

     Will you ever return to it?

     i will be implementing a very similar strategy starting after this video. but with songs taking the front priority instead of videos
4.20.17  6:40 am   Is it plausible to expect the video by the end of April?

4.20.17  6:24 am   That long question is beautiful and the fact that you actually answered it is even more so.

     some people hated it

4.20.17  6:16 am   Couldn't you just double the framerate right before you export the final video? Like when you're all done with everything and just need to export. All it does is add in-between frames and makes the filesize twice as big, but the video would still be the same length.

     the way i make videos is much more layered than i think you realize

      4.20.17  3:27 pm   this doesn't make sense. it wouldn't be an issue unless for some reason you are using individual separate images in succession to keyframe an animation manually at 30fps, which i'm pretty sure you aren't doing

     the way i make videos is a bit more complex than i think you realize. i would love to explain the whole process to you but i need to focus on making the video instead

4.20.17  5:43 am   Why did you answer that giant eyesore, won't other people be compelled to do the same thing now?

     some people liked it
4.20.17  3:52 am   What's the password to reality.html?

4.20.17  3:45 am   do u ever get statement instead of questions, and how do u answer them

     the same way i answer questions. which is to post it, and then type something that i think is reasonable, afterwards

4.20.17  3:39 am   Why is 1 + 1 = 3 ?

     because there is a secret 1 hidden somewhere

4.20.17  3:35 am   this is not a question, but I just wanted to congratulate both you and that incredible question asker on the massive wall of text you worked together to create for my incredulous entertainment

     some people hated it
4.20.17  3:23 am   do you believe in an afterlife?
4.20.17  3:23 am   WHEN wiLL motherFUCKing hotEWIFGFFG Come oUT?
4.20.17  3:22 am   When will HOTEWIG come out?
4.20.17  3:22 am   When will HOTEWIG come out? Please -matt also

4.20.17  3:21 am   when will hotewig *not* come out?

     june 17, 2016

4.20.17  3:05 am   How do you manage the stress of having to constantly produce content?

     talk to myself, and record it

4.20.17  3:01 am   what happened to your reality page?

     nothing, it is still there, at its normal location, with all the content it always had on it
4.20.17  2:50 am   Why did you make the History of Japan video? Was there a particular reason you chose Japan?

4.20.17  2:47 am   What's an updog?

     any creature who pays yearly respects to Upfam

4.20.17  2:29 am   Doing anything for 420?

     working on the current project

4.20.17  1:58 am   I feel like New Canaan is your signature song, in that it has all the song elements that fit into your artistic style. Would you agree?

     no. it is more like a signature 2009 'travel' song (it was mainly written in 2009, and is similar to many others that i wrote, on journeys to places) but some of the resolutions of the verses, like particularly the end of the 3rd, are more typical of how i would write and/or fix songs during 2013 (this one got polished up and edited like hundreds of others did during 2013) and recording wise, it is typical of what i might do in 2014, because it was recorded in 2014. certain recording elements of late 2015, such as more vocal harmonies, are not there. but i think the 2009 'travel' feel is overwhelmingly what characterizes the song
